add.summary: Adds provided integer to this one. Returns this integer

subtract.summary: Substracts provided integer from this one. Returns this integer

multiply.summary: Multiplies this integer by provided run. Returns this integer

divide.summary: Divides this integer by provided one. Returns this integer

clamp.summary: If this integer smaller then provided min makes this integer equal to provided min or makes this integer eqaul to provided max if this integer is bigger then max

abs.summary: If integer is smaller than 0 multiplies it by -1

toDouble.summary: Converts this integer to a double

clone.summary: Returns new integer equal to this one
